title: Executive Order 8028-Changing the Title of Executive Director of the National Youth Administration to Administrator of the National Youth Administration
content: By virtue of and pursuant to the authority vested in me as President of the United States, it is hereby ordered that the title of the officer appointed and designated to have the immediate supervision of the National Youth Administration be changed from Executive Director to Administrator of the National Youth Administration.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 8028-Changing the Title of Executive Director of the National Youth Administration to Administrator of the National Youth Administration Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/371828
